marklogic.body: I can TOTALLY relate to what you struggle with. I tend to let too much emotion creep into what I am saying and instead of it sounding harmless, it sounds Cold, irritated or just plain mean. I havent quite got the hang of it, but I have to learn quick. With 4 kids who I communicate DAILY with (I homeschool right now), I cant be coming as a cranky mom all day.Â You were probably angry at the radio station and redirected your anger to your husband. Next time, yell at the radio and ask your husband nicely if you could just turn it Off....now for me to practice what I preach ;)
